sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_fsm_map_integr.FSMBeansImpl</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Script to support requesting outbound calls to Beans.AI map provider from Map Integration for FSM plugin</description>
        <name>FSMBeansImpl</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FSMBeansImpl = Class.create();
FSMBeansImpl.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.helper = new FSMMapProviderHelper();
        this.util = new FSMMapProviderCommonUtil();
        this.adapter = new FSMMapProviderAdapter();
        this.responseProcessor = new FSMMapProviderResponseProcessor();
		this.endPointMap ={
			'travelTimes': 'time_matrix',
			'travelDistances':'distance_matrix',
			'travelTimeDistances':'timedistance_matrix',
		}
    },

    processRequest: function(payload, config) {
        try {
            let action = this.util.getSpokeName(config);
            let inputs = this._buildSpokeInput(payload);

            let result = this.adapter.execute(inputs, action);
            result = this._buildResponseObject(payload, result);

            let data = this.adapter.processResponse(result);
			data.matrixField = payload.matrixField;

            data = this.responseProcessor.transformResponse(
                data,
                FSMMapProviderConstants.MAP_VENDOR.BEANS_AI,
            );

            let usageCount = this.helper.increaseUsageCounter(
                config.map_vendor,
                data?.matrix?.numOrigins * data?.matrix?.numDestinations,
            );

            let logData = {};
            logData.request_count = usageCount?.request_count;
            logData.location_elements_count = usageCount?.location_elements_count;
            logData.actionName = action;

            return this.helper.buildDataResponse(data, logData);

        } catch (ex) {
            throw ex.toString();
        }
    },

    _buildResponseObject: function(payload, outputs) {
        var request_id = outputs['request_id'];
        var response = outputs['rows'];
        var action_status = outputs['__action_status__'];

        return {
            action_status: action_status,
            response: {
                requestId: request_id,
                rows: JSON.parse(response),
                stat: {
                    uniqueSource: payload.sourcesIdx.length,
                    uniqueDestination: payload.destinationsIdx.length,
                },
            },
        };
    },

    _buildSpokeInput: function(payload) {
        var inputs = {};

        inputs['points'] = payload.points;
        inputs['sourceidx'] = payload.sourcesIdx;
        inputs['destinationidx'] = payload.destinationsIdx;
        inputs['countryiso3'] = payload.countryiso3 ? payload.countryiso3 : 'USA';
        inputs['request_id'] = payload.requestId;
        inputs['async'] = payload.asynchronous;
		inputs['beans_endpoint'] = this.endPointMap[payload.matrixField];

        return inputs;
    },

    type: 'FSMBeansImpl',
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-07 17:06:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>509a46b343992110a878634a1bb8f22f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FSMBeansImpl</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Map Integrations for Field Service" source="sn_fsm_map_integr">32467aba87d8a910f53c7515dabb3598</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Map Integrations for Field Service">32467aba87d8a910f53c7515dabb3598</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_509a46b343992110a878634a1bb8f22f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-08-14 23:13:13</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
